title: Brochure, "Audubon Reader: someone you can count on", 1980s
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: This is an eight-panelled accordion brochure designed to attract advertisers to Audubon magazine. Recto: Multicolored objects, such as natural history prints, jewelry, flowers and copies of Audubon, are arranged as in a collage. Green rectangles, superimposed on the lower part of the panels, are imprinted in white with subscriber information. Verso: In the lower part of each panel, a copy of another Audubon issue appears in color; in the upper part, market information about readers and advertisers is imprinted in black.

tombstone.epitaph:
Brochure, "Audubon Reader: someone you can count on", 1980s.
1980s. Offset lithograph on coated paper.. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-145.
